udap_server_san: url to use for this server - must match base server url and be in cert SAN array

udap_additional_communities.issuer: issuer that will be trusted - overrides default value
udap_additional_communities.authorize_endpoint: authorize endpoint for issuer - overrides default value
udap_additional_communities.token_endpoint: token endpoint for issuer - overrides default value
udap_additional_communities.revoke_endpoint: revoke endpoint for issuer - overrides default value
udap_additional_communities.introspect_endpoint: introspect endpoint for issuer - overrides default value
udap_additional_communities.registration_endpoint: registration endpoint for issuer - overrides default value
udap_additional_communities.keys_endpoint: keys endpoint for issuer - overrides default value
